
A careless admin reused a prime across two RSA keys. Intercept the encrypted message: ciphertext1: 463502848875292340975607923923855888240200434514406891985806304401356265622414132136685483633396160290509211754250835518718134489450328619096346696812642238724963714067141058123600932793622717760725255210892750527386937500935281193, ciphertext2: 459261267581832002110621756450851272572759081505019980183478211634140870217334183917248100988152926998194886443568245950203318466262844517560438594687707469929935190281391447528150218094925682954185101405478243588428299854141159305


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=586102714358845546752026042026856781213360723987564847032915966257680694490496658624717983250612207860015241655116485310434555724600858684349561751777631071302330654603062861451297635000404497637281249719076162753905947817837709767, n2=828157787241055479286217112783201141884178641497178842349690042407271567541363042693021693154827728820061183924955659644954942582730480580242777959806660559535200784089424505836475256740175391741811832076357227887306135025948214891, e=535345323728040124717788906338912864627772282901827859626015609981229474364103144037452515378397714114893441064461497534641115450527708115436029256086894045338136730592228113375899435728776012202377825570062430458622097566418347369

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{wxakvymm}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 463502848875292340975607923923855888240200434514406891985806304401356265622414132136685483633396160290509211754250835518718134489450328619096346696812642238724963714067141058123600932793622717760725255210892750527386937500935281193, ciphertext2: 459261267581832002110621756450851272572759081505019980183478211634140870217334183917248100988152926998194886443568245950203318466262844517560438594687707469929935190281391447528150218094925682954185101405478243588428299854141159305
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=586102714358845546752026042026856781213360723987564847032915966257680694490496658624717983250612207860015241655116485310434555724600858684349561751777631071302330654603062861451297635000404497637281249719076162753905947817837709767, n2=828157787241055479286217112783201141884178641497178842349690042407271567541363042693021693154827728820061183924955659644954942582730480580242777959806660559535200784089424505836475256740175391741811832076357227887306135025948214891, e=535345323728040124717788906338912864627772282901827859626015609981229474364103144037452515378397714114893441064461497534641115450527708115436029256086894045338136730592228113375899435728776012202377825570062430458622097566418347369
extra_info: p=27201972101159029122453070084791175787650975001925633251748277940791972873884005943998947470442967293185639824991181, q=21546331721069323529130166144680055177742266855113784653150795328788916753771081467904504148736101730605852296001507, r=38436138362765112583443032429574106115516343039532651417694393040764381717804858153426867724288120916272068140477913, φ(n1)=586102714358845546752026042026856781213360723987564847032915966257680694490496658624717983250612207860015241655116436562130733496248207101113332280546665678060473615185157962378028054110776842549869346267456983684882156325716717080, φ(n2)=828157787241055479286217112783201141884178641497178842349690042407271567541363042693021693154827728820061183924955599662484858748294368007044203705645367300925306137653353660648105703441703815802190500704484203664659257105511735472
